column4: or4n, does anyone know any methods to make FF faster on Ubuntu?
I'm extremely new, what would that specifically mean.
right click the person in the tree or tab bar and select log to disk
open up preferences and -> Chatting -> Logging -> Open Data Folder
should allow you to view your logs
Alright usser, will try it out
untar the source, go through usual ./configure &&  make install only instead of make install use checkinstall

that will compile firefox and create a package that will install just like any other package. name it something else when checkinstall prompts you, like firefox-manual-build. otherwise ubuntu will try to upgrade it
